generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and crosswalk lines, where a person is crossing.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the image, adjacent to the road, with a curb separating it.
- building: A large yellow building with multiple windows and a brown roof is visible on the left side of the image.
- vegetation: Trees are visible in the background and along the roadside.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast with clouds.
- person: A woman wearing a striped shirt and sunglasses is pushing a stroller across the road.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a silver sedan and a white van.
- truck: A blue van is parked on the left side of the image.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the right side of the image, attached to a pole.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the left side of the image, attached to a pole.
- pole: Several poles are visible in the image, including one with a traffic light and another with a traffic sign.
- terrain: Some grass and soil are visible along the edge of the road and sidewalk.
